snippet.title: Mushroom Kingdom Fusion Trailer
snippet.description:
Behold the awesomeness that is Mushroom Kingdom Fusion.

Most recent demo available for download here:
http://www.fusiongameworks.net/smf/index.php/topic,673.0.html

Some of the levels and characters shown in this trailer have not yet been released. As new demos becomes available I will update the above link.

And you can watch a review of the game here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6ww89_BNGWI

My digital tips jar : https://www.patreon.com/Hadriex
I'm on Steam: http://steamcommunity.com/id/Hadriex/
I'm also on Minds.com: https://www.minds.com/Hadriex
And Twitter: https://twitter.com/Hadriex/
Hadriex Discord community: https://discord.gg/FFDSjch
